## TransactableMoneyp.stakeMP() method

Stake MP to start earning fee revenue or increase existing stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stakeMP(amount: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of MP to add to new or existing stake. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out an existing MP stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base.mpstake.collateralgain.md) and [BPD gain](./lib-base.mpstake.bpdgain.md)<!-- -->.
